name: Lost (itch) (Catastrophically-CR)
description:
In this peculiar world, you play as a silent and depressed young man that seems lost and  finds quite a strange place where there's four doors leading to new areas that have yet to be explored.  Starting off, the character is seen simply wandering around before acquiring a key leading him to the first area. The more the game progresses, the more questionable this strange world becomes.
(Trailer music by dehartmusic)

Fixed:
Back-tracking issue
Tileset/map error
Broken reset puzzle error
Issues with character sprites
Issues with maps and transportation
Typos and dialog alignment
Events (so things run smoothly)

Note: Download RPG Maker VX Ace RTP in order to launch the game. To adjust screen size, press f6; to go into fullscreen, pres f5. Game uploaded on 4/28, edited on 5/5.
